description: Many media players can open playlists in the PLS format. Some of them include Apple iTunes, Nullsoft Winamp, Clementine, and VideoLAN VLC media player. Text editors can also open PLS files since they are saved in plain text.

There are various types of files used to store playlists for multimedia players. The most common playlist file type is .M3U , which is created and opened by many media players. Some other playlist files include .ASX , .WPL , and .XSPF files.
